page.title: 10LIFE AT HOME IN BROOK
page.content: The average family in Brook consists of 3 people.Half of the families in this area of Brook own a {household pets},which is usually a cat or a dog. A normal diet consists of meat from the nearest town (Freshwater) and vegetables grown at the{local farms. All of the houses are on the{mains {water supply}but not all of the houses are connected to the main gas supply,they need to have bottles of gas delivered to them once a month. The average house in this area has 4 bedrooms,a kitchen,a living room, a dinning room and a hall.In most cases they also have a large garden and a garage.
